name: Aggressive Solutions
effect:
Replicate — Spend two counters. (You may spend two
additional counters when you play this event. If you do, put
this event in your hand instead of destroying it.) To play this
event, you must command three [TNG] personnel. Each player
places the top card of his or her dilemma pile beneath an
opponent's non-headquarters mission. Destroy this event.
"Data, cover me..."

name: Agonizing Encounter
effect:
For each headquarters you command, this dilemma
is cost -1. Your opponent names a skill. For each of
your mission that require that skill, randomly select a
personnel to be stopped.

"I was lucky that thing had knees..."
"That was not his knee."

name: Aluura, Nice to Everyone
effect: Alien
• Acquisition • Honor

Dabo Girl.
Order — Each player reveals the top card of his or her deck. The player who revealed the card with the highest cost may take that card into hand. In the case of a tie, each tied player may take that card into hand. You may do this only once each turn.
"Oh... You want me to be 'nice.'"

he or she does this, that ship and personnel are then placed at a mission where your opponent could play them.
